claim: Merlin, the TV show, was created by Julian Jones.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Merlin  (  Myrddin  )  is a legendary figure best known as the wizard featured in Arthurian legend and medieval Welsh poetry .

claim: Merlin, the TV show, was created by Julian Jones.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The standard depiction of the character first appears in Geoffrey of Monmouth 's Historia Regum Britanniae , written c. 1136 , and is based on an amalgamation of previous historical and legendary figures .

claim: Merlin, the TV show, was created by Julian Jones.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Geoffrey combined existing stories of Myrddin Wyllt  (  Merlinus Caledonensis  )  , a North Brythonic prophet and madman with no connection to King Arthur , with tales of the Romano-British war leader Ambrosius Aurelianus to form the composite figure he called Merlin Ambrosius  (  Myrddin Emrys  )  .

claim: Merlin, the TV show, was created by Julian Jones.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He is allegedly buried in the Broceliande forest , near Paimpont in Brittany .

claim: Merlin, the TV show, was created by Julian Jones.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Geoffrey 's rendering of the character was immediately popular , especially in Wales .

claim: Merlin, the TV show, was created by Julian Jones.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Later writers expanded the account to produce a fuller image of the wizard .

claim: Merlin, the TV show, was created by Julian Jones.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Merlin 's traditional biography casts him as a cambion : born of a mortal woman , sired by an incubus , the non-human from whom he inherits his supernatural powers and abilities .

claim: Merlin, the TV show, was created by Julian Jones.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The name of Merlin 's mother is not usually stated , but is given as Adhan in the oldest version of the Prose Brut .

claim: Merlin, the TV show, was created by Julian Jones.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Merlin matures to an ascendant sagehood and engineers the birth of Arthur through magic and intrigue .

premise_source_doc_sentence: Later authors have Merlin serve as the king 's advisor until he is bewitched and imprisoned by the Lady of the Lake .

premise_source_doc_sentence: Merlin is a British fantasy-adventure television programme created by Julian Jones , Jake Michie , Julian Murphy , and Johnny Capps , starring Colin Morgan in the title role .
